Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Ben Gurion Airport took on the aspect of a Palestine Liberation Organization convention early yesterday morning as smiling prisoners chanted slogans, flashed victory signs and displayed a Palestinian flag.
